name: Pong (itch) (Shravani)
description:
This is a basic game of pong that can be played by one or two players, created using Unity and C#. 

The paddles can be controlled independently to hit the ball, and a point is scored when the ball crosses the screen on the opposite side. The difficulty (ball speed) increases each time the ball collides with a surface.

I've included my source code on my GitHub. Feel free to add any suggestions and feedback!

Controls: Move either paddle vertically using the W/S keys or the Up/Down arrow keys.
